assets.description: Synternet is a blockchain that powers modular, interoperable data infrastructure across all major chains.
assets.extended_description: The Data Layer is a decentralized, permissionless protocol built on Synternet that serves as the customizable execution layer between all blockchains, enabling developers instant access to any cross-chain data. It uses a pub-sub (publish-subscribe) framework where data providers can stream live data to applications and smart contracts
assets.name: Synternet
